title: Earthworm: anatomy and dissection
brief_description: Stresses correct laboratory techniques for dissection, showing a close look at the digestive, circulatory, excretory, nervous, and reproductive systems of the earthworm. Shows functioning of these systems by means of extreme close-up photography, photomicrography and diagrams.
description: Stresses correct laboratory techniques for dissection, showing a close look at the digestive, circulatory, excretory, nervous, and reproductive systems of the earthworm. Shows functioning of these systems by means of extreme close-up photography, photomicrography and diagrams.
